mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bim_grab..cinema_mtime (id, city_id, area, NAME, address, latitude, longitude, rating, has_3d, has_imax, has_Wifi, has_Park, route, tel) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{has3d,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasImax,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasWifi,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasPark,jdbcType=BIT}, #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE bim_grab..cinema_mtime SET city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_3d = #{has3d,jdbcType=BIT}, has_imax = #{hasImax,jdbcType=BIT}, has_Wifi = #{hasWifi,jdbcType=BIT}, has_Park = #{hasPark,jdbcType=BIT}, route = #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, city_id, area, name, address, latitude, longitude, rating, has_3d, has_imax, has_Wifi, has_Park, route, tel FROM bim_grab..cinema_mtime WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
